This movie tells a story set in nineteenth-century China and focusing on the life-long friendship between two girls who develop their own secret code as a way to contend with the rigid social norms imposed on women.

The main actors are Zhang Ziyi and Song Kang. Zhang is known for her roles in dramas such as "Feng Xiaoxiao" (2013) and in comedies such as "Zhang Ziyi in My Home is Full of Books" (2014). Song is known for his roles in dramas such as "Jianye Dongfang" (2015) and in comedies such as "Song Kang in "I'm Not a Robot"" (2017).

Overall, "Snow Flower and the Secret Fan" is a well-made movie that tells an interesting story. The actors do a good job of bringing their characters to life. Overall, I would recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys well-made movies that tell interesting stories.
